name: Move 1 element
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards one element

name: Move 1 element
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards one element

name: Move 1 element
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards one element

name: Move 1 element
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards one element

name: Move 2 same elements
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards an elements twice

name: Move 2 sequential elements clockwise
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards two consecutive elements (In card's order)

name: Move 2 sequential elements counter-clockwise
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards two consecutive elements (In card's order)

name: Move 2 chosen order elements
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards two elements (you choose the order)

name: Move 3 sequential or chosen order elements
description: Make your pawn and the Balance pawn move towards three elements (in card's order or add two energies to choose)

name: Harmony!
description: Moves all pawns towards the center by 1

name: Farm
description: Increases your meal production by 2 or increases your meal production by 1 and your allies meal production by 1

name: Breweries
description: Increases your beverage production by 3 or increases your beverage production by 2 and your allies beverage production by 1

name: Healing brew
description: You can now choose to consume one beverage at the end of the turn to gain 2 more energies; each additional cards of this type will improve the gain by 1

name: Harmonious meal
description: Add this card to your action cards. You can now choose this action: consume one beverage and one meal to move your pawn (Alone!) in the direction of your choice

name: Feather bed
description: When resting gain 2 more energies. Gain 1 more energy at the end of the turn
